story_27_63000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I...used to think that the only one who could save
me was myself.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I believed that ever since I was a child, and that’s
why I trained myself to be strong.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Friendship...trust...bonds... Those were just
shackles that would make me weaker.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_0500_10: But...I don’t think that anymore, thanks to all this.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’m not invincible. There’s only so much I can
do all by myself.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I knew it deep down...but I was scared of 
change, so I stubbornly held on to my beliefs.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_0800_10:
When things got worse, the ones who saved
me were...
story_27_63000/2401_1001_1300_10:
There are people by my side who are willing to
risk their lives for me...scold me...cry for me...
guide me...
story_27_63000/2401_1001_1400_10:
When I realized that, I felt...that I want to return
that feeling.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_1500_10: I wonder if this is what they call...
story_27_63000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Maybe putting your trust in someone other than
yourself...isn’t so bad after all.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Our chances at winning the PML are gone, but I
assure you, I will be king one day!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_2400_10:
In return, I shall protect you...and everyone under
my rule!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I’ll become a king who treasures the power of
bonds more than anyone else!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_2700_10: Of course! I’ll follow you foreverrrr!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_2800_10: Young master! Look at how you’ve grown!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_2900_10: I, Sawyer, have no regrets! I can live happy!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_3200_10: You all look like you’re having fun.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_3400_10:
I didn’t say this earlier, but you saved us...
Thank you.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_3500_10: Oh? I never thought I’d hear that from you!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_3700_10:
*chuckle*
Sorry. Actually, I had a small surprise for you.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_3800_10: Lear! I am so moved by your words!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_3900_10:
You...you were my teammates for
the tournament...
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4000_10:
They helped me battle Team Break back at their
hideout. And that’s not all they did.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4100_10:
These two made their way to the PML semifinals!
They won, even though you couldn’t show up!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4200_10: Lear! Your PML challenge isn’t over yet!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4400_10: M-my apologies, young master! We knew, but...
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4500_10: We...didn’t get a chance to tell you...
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Well, then. That means my next opponent
is [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4800_10: Cheren, when you go back, tell them this:
story_27_63000/2401_1001_4900_10: This time—for sure—I will crush them all!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5100_10: With the power of my team!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5300_10: Young master, we must hurry and prepare!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5400_10:
No, we have to finish up what we started here.
Team Break still has more hideouts.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5500_10:
I want to enter the semifinals without
any interruptions.
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5600_10:
Just you wait, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’ll
be there to put you in your place!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5800_10:
That personality of his sure is twisted, but I think
he just might have what it takes to become a
great Trainer... Even a king!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_5900_10:
I’ll do my best to help you all out so you can have
the best match possible!
story_27_63000/2401_1001_6100_10: (Lear, I’m looking forward to our battle.)
story_27_63000/2401_1001_6200_10: (We’ll see you at our showdown in the semifinals!)
